alert.note: Alert for Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Cape May; Coastal Atlantic (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 2:29PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Atlantic and Cape May Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 229 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Green Creek, or near Cape May, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ocean City, Somers Point, Margate City, Woodbine, Sea Isle City, Estell Manor, Avalon, Longport, Corbin City, Cape May Court House, Scotch Bonnet, Beesleys Point, English Creek, Seaville, Marmora, Green Creek, Dennisville, Goshen, Strathmere and Rio Grande. This includes Garden State Parkway between mile markers 2 and 32. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Cape May; Coastal Atlantic
